thread.section_title: Constant Contact Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Constant Contact | www.constantcontact.com
thread.title: angie brown
thread.title_full: Constant Contact reviewed by angie brown

author: angie brown
title: angie brown
text: Constant Contact is a terrific program. Anyone can learn to use it and see immediate results. I've been using this program for two years. I still get excited to work on each new campaign. Their customer service, free webinars, and on-site training are excellent. The cost is very reasonable. I work for a not-for-profit association. I can’t imagine working without CC now. If I owned a business (retail or service), I wouldn’t begin to operate without CC!
